name: Tsubakisakuhana Girls' High School Idol Club
description: The Tsubakisakuhana Girls' High School Idol Club was an idol group formed by Rurika Tsubaki in Love Live! School Idol Musical. They were the idol group of Tsubakisakuhana Girls' High School prior to the combined annexation of the two schools in the series finale which led to both the creation of Tsubaki Takizakura Girls' High School and it's school idol group. The group consisted of six members.
